dct_title_s: Recens edita totius Novi Belgii in America Septentrionali siti
dct_description_sm: Relief shown pictorially. "Cum gratia et privil. S.R.I. Vicariat in part. Rheni, Sveviae, et Juris Franconici." State 4 with Boston still spelled Briston. Reissue of Mathew Seutter map from Jansson prototype. Inset view shows New York. Shows names of Indian tribes.
